article_title: Why health insurance companies are doomed

twitter.description:
It’s that time of the year. No, not Halloween, but something almost as scary—open enrollment season.
It’s time to choose among the many plans offered through the various health exchanges as p...
twitter.title: Why health insurance companies are doomed

article_metadata.keywords: finance, leadership, affordable care act, health, health care, health insurance, kaiser permanente, obamacare, u.s. health care system
article_metadata.sailthru.tags: Affordable Care Act, Health, Health Care, HEALTH INSURANCE, Kaiser Permanente, Obamacare, u.s. health care system
article_metadata.description: Massive political contributions notwithstanding, competition among health systems and pressure to reduce costs will put an end to health insurers as we know them.
